title: Eternal Mystery
detail_text: <:th_ch0008/>Hmm hm hm, hmmm~ 𝅘𝅥𝅮<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Ah, Kayo-chin, that song...!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Hehe, did you figure it out?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>It’s the theme song for the School Idol Rangers!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Correct! It was so fun to perform that play with everyone. You looked like you were having a blast, which reminded me just how much I love your high-energy vibe, Rin-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Ehehe, you’re making me blush! If you’re that happy about it, maybe I should put together another play~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Yeah, do it, do it! I’m still hung up on whether or not Ai-san was a friend or foe at the end of the play!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Sharp as always, Kayo-chin! We left it ambiguous because Ai-san hasn’t decided whether she wants to be a friend or a foe.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Wait... You’re saying it hasn’t been decided if she’s a friend or a foe yet? This is gonna drive me crazy~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>That’ll remain an eternal mystery until Ai-san decides, nya...!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
